title: Telegram Bot
description: Telegram bot sends updates on your network and receives commands to control devices
bot_token_helper: Enter the token received from the BotFather
chat_id_helper: Leave this field empty, it will be filled automatically
webhook_url_helper: Enter your webhook url. Telegram recommends https://www.example.com/yourbottoken
triggerselection_helper: Select the devices that trigger a bot message
help_text:
Supported commands are: 
 
 /help: shows this message. 
 /home: presence control.
 /scene: activate a scene.
 /device: switch a device.
 /sensor: request sensor reading.
unknown_command:
Please start by giving me a command.
Type /help for a list of valid commands.
err_unknown_command: I'm sorry, I don't know this command
